title: Soccer Manager Sacking Predictor
description: Machine Learning Project to predict whether a soccer manager will get sacked based on recent performance and fan’s sentiments.

title: Beijing Property Market Analysis
description: Analysed Beijing’s property market from 2011 to 2017, the attributes of houses that have caused the rise in prices, as part of BT2102 coursework’s project

title: Song Lyrics Classification
description: Collected numerous song lyrics based on different genres, and evaluated various machine learning models to classify the lyrics, as part of ISC213 coursework.

title: AI Cover Letter Generator
description: Personal AI Automation Project to generate a custom cover letter draft based on resume and the corresponding job listing.

title: 24X365
description: A web application to make time management easy, fulfilling and habitual by leveraging AI and Google Calendar Tools.

title: CS50 Database Final Project
description: Designed and implemented a custom database schema, efficient queries, views and indexes as part final project of the online course CS50.

title: Excel File Merging
description: Python script to accelerate data processing by automating Excel file merging, reducing manual work time. Created for Sole Vision’s Documents.
